author: Krisztian Sandor, Tom Carreras
title: Bitcoin Rises to $110K as Altcoins Rally; Traders Skeptical of Breakout
description: Positioning across crypto markets doesn't suggest a top, but neither does it seem ideal for continued rally.
content:
Bitcoin recaptured the $110,000 level for the second consecutive day, perhaps dragged higher by even larger gains among altcoins.
Up 0.9% more than 1% in the last 24 hours, bitcoin was trading just … [+2758 chars]
